coding.display: Opiates [Presence] in Urine by Screen method

code.text: Opiates [Presence] in Urine by Screen method

coding.display: Using the MyPAIN tool has helped me begin preparing for a conversation with my provider about managing my pain.
What are the biggest barriers to achieving your activity goals? For example: I have a lot of stress from work which makes my pain worse.

resource.valueString: My barriers to a pain free life are 1.  It is impossible. 2. I am too lazy to exercise.  3. I am overweight.  4. I am too old to change now.

coding.display: We’d like to know more about you and your goals. What are your most important activity goals? For example: I’d like to be able to walk without pain.

resource.valueString: These are my goals for a pain-free environment.  Get up every morning and have a great day with no back spasms and no hip pain and no aches and pains throughout my whole body.

coding.display: How much did pain interfere with your day to day activities?
How much did pain interfere with your work around the home?
How intense was your pain at its worst?
How intense was your average pain?
What type of UPPER LEGS pain?
